meanings.definition: Lacking a back or having no back.
meanings.sent1: The chair was uncomfortable because it was backless.
meanings.sent2: She wore a backless dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The backless chair felt like sitting on a bench.
meanings.sent4: The backless sofa seemed to be missing a crucial part.
meanings.sent5: The backless design made the chair look incomplete.

meanings.definition: (Of clothing) designed to expose the back.
meanings.sent1: The backless top was perfect for the hot weather.
meanings.sent2: She chose a backless gown for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: The backless dress revealed a surprise tattoo on her back.
meanings.sent4: The backless swimsuit made her feel bold and confident.
meanings.sent5: The backless outfit accentuated her graceful posture.
